tech_jobs.title: Senior Python Backend Developer
tech_jobs.description: We are seeking a skilled Python Backend Developer to join our engineering team and build robust, scalable server-side applications. You will design and implement APIs, manage databases, and ensure high-performance backend systems that power our applications. This role offers the opportunity to work with cutting-edge Python technologies, collaborate with cross-functional teams, and contribute to mission-critical systems that serve thousands of users.
requirements: 5+ years of experience in backend development using Python
Advanced proficiency in Python and related technologies
Experience with web frameworks such as Flask or Django
Strong understanding of database management systems (PostgreSQL, MySQL)
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure)
Proven experience with RESTful API design and implementation
Strong understanding of software engineering principles
Experience with microservices architecture
Knowledge of Docker and containerization
Excellent problem-solving and analytical abilities

tech_jobs.title: Full Stack Software Engineer
tech_jobs.description: Full Stack Developer work in the IT department performing both front- and back-end operations on websites and computer systems. They design front-end website architecture and work closely with Graphic Designers to ensure website applications collaborate well with their design elements. Full Stack Developers oversee entire projects from start to finish, evaluating user needs and analyzing technical issues to program highly functional systems.
requirements: 3-5 years of hands-on software development experience
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent professional experience
Expertise in front-end technologies including JavaScript, CSS3, HTML5, React.js
Knowledge of server-side programming languages including Python, Node.js, Java
Familiarity with DBMS technology (SQLServer, MongoDB, MySQL)
Experience with caching mechanisms (Redis, Memcached)
Knowledge of UI/UX and basic prototype design
Experience working with Nginx or Apache servers
Excellent writing and communication skills
Ability to visualize a proposed system and build it

tech_jobs.title: Software Development Engineer
tech_jobs.description: A Software Development Engineer is responsible for developing software programs or systems that align with user needs. We need a Senior Staff Software Engineer with a minimum of 10+ years in software engineering leading teams with a focus on solving complex problems with robust solutions, and product expansion to join our team. You will work on cutting-edge cloud technologies and distributed systems.
requirements: Bachelor's/Master's degree in software engineering or information technology
At least 3-5 years of experience in software development
Strong expertise in Java and Spring Boot framework
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP)
Knowledge of containerization (Docker, Kubernetes)
Experience with CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, GitLab CI)
Understanding of microservices architecture
Strong problem-solving skills
Experience with Agile/Scrum methodologies
Excellent communication and collaboration abilities

tech_jobs.title: Backend API Developer
tech_jobs.description: Join our backend team to design, develop, and maintain scalable Python backend applications using FastAPI. You'll build robust RESTful APIs that serve frontend applications and third-party integrations, implement secure authentication systems, and optimize database performance. This position offers significant technical challenges and the opportunity to shape our backend development practices.
requirements: 3+ years of experience in backend development using Python
Strong expertise in FastAPI or similar modern Python frameworks
Experience designing RESTful APIs and GraphQL endpoints
Proficiency with PostgreSQL or MySQL
Knowledge of authentication systems (JWT, OAuth2)
Experience with asynchronous processing (Celery, Redis)
Understanding of API security best practices
Experience with API documentation (OpenAPI/Swagger)
Strong testing practices (pytest, unittest)
Excellent debugging and optimization skills

tech_jobs.title: Junior Python Developer
tech_jobs.description: We're looking for an enthusiastic Junior Python Developer to join our growing engineering team. This is an excellent opportunity to learn from experienced developers while working on real-world projects. You'll contribute to building and maintaining web applications, writing clean code, and collaborating with cross-functional teams.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
1-2 years of experience with Python programming
Basic understanding of web frameworks (Django or Flask)
Familiarity with SQL databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL)
Knowledge of version control (Git)
Understanding of RESTful API principles
Basic knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Strong willingness to learn and grow
Good communication skills
Problem-solving mindset
benefits: Learning budget for courses and conferences

tech_jobs.title: DevOps Engineer
tech_jobs.description: We're seeking a DevOps Engineer to join our infrastructure team. You'll be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining CI/CD pipelines, managing cloud infrastructure, and ensuring system reliability. This role requires a strong understanding of automation, containerization, and cloud technologies.
requirements: 3+ years of experience in DevOps or Site Reliability Engineering
Strong experience with AWS or Azure cloud platforms
Expertise in containerization (Docker, Kubernetes)
Experience with Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, CloudFormation)
Proficiency in scripting (Python, Bash, PowerShell)
Knowledge of CI/CD tools (Jenkins, GitLab CI, GitHub Actions)
Experience with monitoring tools (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK)
Understanding of networking and security best practices
Strong troubleshooting and problem-solving skills
Excellent communication and documentation abilities

tech_jobs.title: Frontend React Developer
tech_jobs.description: Join our frontend team to build beautiful, performant user interfaces using React and modern JavaScript. You'll work closely with designers and backend developers to create seamless user experiences. We're looking for someone passionate about clean code, component architecture, and user-centric design.
requirements: 3+ years of experience with React and modern JavaScript (ES6+)
Strong proficiency in TypeScript
Experience with state management (Redux, Context API, Zustand)
Solid understanding of HTML5, CSS3, and responsive design
Experience with build tools (Webpack, Vite)
Knowledge of testing frameworks (Jest, React Testing Library)
Understanding of RESTful APIs and async operations
Experience with Git and version control workflows
Strong attention to detail and UI/UX sensibilities
Excellent problem-solving skills

tech_jobs.title: Data Engineer
tech_jobs.description: We're looking for a Data Engineer to design and build scalable data pipelines that process billions of events daily. You'll work with cutting-edge big data technologies, optimize data storage and retrieval, and enable data-driven decision making across the organization.
requirements: 4+ years of experience in data engineering
Strong proficiency in Python and SQL
Experience with Apache Spark and distributed computing
Knowledge of workflow orchestration tools (Airflow, Dagster)
Experience with cloud data platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure)
Understanding of data warehousing concepts (Snowflake, BigQuery, Redshift)
Experience with streaming platforms (Kafka, Kinesis)
Strong understanding of ETL/ELT processes
Experience with data modeling and schema design
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills

tech_jobs.title: Mobile App Developer (Flutter)
tech_jobs.description: Join our mobile team to build cross-platform applications using Flutter. You'll develop features for both iOS and Android, work with RESTful APIs, and create smooth, responsive user interfaces. This role is perfect for developers passionate about mobile experiences and Flutter framework.
requirements: 2+ years of mobile development experience
Strong proficiency in Flutter and Dart
Experience with iOS and Android development
Knowledge of state management solutions (Provider, Riverpod, Bloc)
Experience integrating RESTful APIs
Understanding of mobile UI/UX best practices
Experience with Firebase or similar backend services
Knowledge of app store deployment processes
Strong debugging and performance optimization skills
Excellent communication abilities

tech_jobs.title: Machine Learning Engineer
tech_jobs.description: We're seeking a Machine Learning Engineer to develop and deploy ML models at scale. You'll work on exciting projects involving natural language processing, computer vision, and recommendation systems. This role combines software engineering with applied machine learning research.
requirements: 3+ years of experience in machine learning engineering
Strong proficiency in Python and ML frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch)
Experience with NLP and/or computer vision
Knowledge of MLOps practices and tools
Experience deploying models to production
Strong understanding of statistics and mathematics
Experience with cloud ML services (AWS SageMaker, GCP AI Platform)
Proficiency with data processing libraries (pandas, numpy)
Experience with containerization (Docker, Kubernetes)
Master's degree in Computer Science, Statistics, or related field preferred

tech_jobs.title: QA Automation Engineer
tech_jobs.description: Join our quality assurance team to build and maintain automated testing frameworks. You'll ensure software quality through comprehensive test coverage, CI/CD integration, and performance testing. This role requires both technical expertise and attention to detail.
requirements: 3+ years of experience in QA automation
Strong proficiency in Python or JavaScript for test automation
Experience with test frameworks (Selenium, Cypress, Playwright)
Knowledge of API testing tools (Postman, REST Assured)
Experience with CI/CD integration (Jenkins, GitLab)
Understanding of testing methodologies and best practices
Experience with test management tools (JIRA, TestRail)
Strong analytical and debugging skills
Experience with performance testing tools (JMeter, k6)
Excellent communication and documentation skills

tech_jobs.title: Security Engineer
tech_jobs.description: We're looking for a Security Engineer to protect our systems and data from cyber threats. You'll conduct security assessments, implement security controls, monitor for vulnerabilities, and respond to security incidents. This role requires deep knowledge of security principles and hands-on technical skills.
requirements: 4+ years of experience in cybersecurity or information security
Strong knowledge of security frameworks (NIST, ISO 27001)
Experience with penetration testing and vulnerability assessments
Proficiency in scripting (Python, Bash, PowerShell)
Knowledge of network security and protocols
Experience with SIEM tools (Splunk, ELK)
Understanding of cloud security (AWS, Azure)
Experience with security tools (Nmap, Metasploit, Burp Suite)
Relevant certifications (CISSP, CEH, OSCP) preferred
Strong analytical and incident response skills

tech_jobs.title: Site Reliability Engineer (SRE)
tech_jobs.description: Join our SRE team to ensure the reliability, performance, and scalability of our production systems. You'll build automation, improve monitoring, participate in on-call rotations, and work closely with development teams to build reliable software.
requirements: 4+ years of experience in SRE or similar role
Strong experience with Kubernetes and container orchestration
Proficiency in programming (Python, Go, or similar)
Experience with Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, Ansible)
Deep knowledge of Linux systems administration
Experience with monitoring and observability (Prometheus, Grafana, Datadog)
Understanding of distributed systems and microservices
Experience with incident management and postmortems
Strong troubleshooting and debugging skills
Excellent communication and collaboration abilities

tech_jobs.title: Software Engineer in Test (SDET)
tech_jobs.description: We're seeking a Software Development Engineer in Test to build robust test automation frameworks and ensure software quality. You'll work closely with developers, design test strategies, and implement automated testing at all levels. This role combines software engineering with quality assurance expertise.
requirements: 3+ years of experience as SDET or similar role
Strong programming skills in Python or Java
Experience building test automation frameworks from scratch
Proficiency with Selenium, Appium, or similar tools
Experience with API testing and tools (REST Assured, Postman)
Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines and integration
Understanding of testing methodologies (unit, integration, E2E)
Experience with containerization (Docker)
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Excellent communication and collaboration abilities

tech_jobs.title: Cloud Solutions Architect
tech_jobs.description: We're looking for a Cloud Solutions Architect to design and implement cloud-based solutions for enterprise clients. You'll work on complex cloud migrations, architect scalable systems, and provide technical leadership. This role requires deep cloud expertise and excellent client-facing skills.
requirements: 5+ years of experience in cloud architecture
Expert knowledge of AWS, Azure, or GCP
Experience designing and implementing cloud migrations
Strong understanding of cloud-native architectures
Experience with Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, CloudFormation)
Knowledge of containerization and orchestration (Docker, Kubernetes)
Understanding of serverless architectures (Lambda, Cloud Functions)
Experience with networking and security in cloud environments
Relevant certifications (AWS Solutions Architect, Azure Architect)
Excellent presentation and client communication skills

tech_jobs.title: Backend Engineer (Node.js)
tech_jobs.description: Join our backend team to build real-time, event-driven applications using Node.js. You'll work on high-traffic systems, implement WebSocket connections, and design scalable APIs. This role is perfect for engineers passionate about asynchronous programming and performance optimization.
requirements: 3+ years of backend development with Node.js
Strong proficiency in JavaScript and TypeScript
Experience with Express.js or similar frameworks
Knowledge of NoSQL databases (MongoDB, Redis)
Experience with real-time communication (WebSockets, Socket.io)
Understanding of event-driven architectures
Experience with message queues (RabbitMQ, Kafka)
Knowledge of RESTful API design
Experience with testing frameworks (Jest, Mocha)
Strong performance optimization skills

tech_jobs.title: Platform Engineer
tech_jobs.description: We're seeking a Platform Engineer to build and maintain internal developer platforms. You'll create tools and services that improve developer productivity, implement CI/CD pipelines, and ensure platform reliability. This role sits at the intersection of DevOps, infrastructure, and developer experience.
requirements: 4+ years of experience in platform engineering or DevOps
Strong experience with Kubernetes and container orchestration
Proficiency in programming (Python, Go, or similar)
Experience with Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, Pulumi)
Knowledge of CI/CD tools and practices (GitLab CI, ArgoCD)
Experience with GitOps workflows
Understanding of service mesh (Istio, Linkerd)
Experience with monitoring and observability tools
Strong automation and scripting skills
Excellent documentation and communication abilities

tech_jobs.title: Database Administrator (DBA)
tech_jobs.description: Join our database team to manage and optimize critical database systems. You'll be responsible for database design, performance tuning, backup and recovery, and ensuring high availability. This role requires deep database expertise and strong operational skills.
requirements: 5+ years of experience as a Database Administrator
Expert knowledge of PostgreSQL and/or MySQL
Strong SQL skills and query optimization
Experience with database design and normalization
Knowledge of replication and high availability solutions
Experience with backup and disaster recovery
Proficiency in scripting (Bash, Python, SQL)
Understanding of database security best practices
Experience with monitoring tools (Prometheus, Grafana)
Strong troubleshooting and problem-solving skills

tech_jobs.title: Embedded Systems Engineer
tech_jobs.description: We're looking for an Embedded Systems Engineer to develop firmware for IoT devices. You'll work on low-level programming, hardware integration, and real-time systems. This role requires strong C/C++ skills and experience with embedded platforms.
requirements: 3+ years of experience in embedded systems development
Strong proficiency in C and C++
Experience with microcontrollers (ARM, ESP32, STM32)
Knowledge of RTOS (FreeRTOS, Zephyr)
Understanding of hardware interfaces (I2C, SPI, UART)
Experience with debugging tools (JTAG, oscilloscope)
Knowledge of embedded Linux
Experience with version control (Git)
Strong problem-solving and analytical skills
Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering or related field

tech_jobs.title: Technical Lead - Microservices
tech_jobs.description: We're seeking a Technical Lead to guide our microservices architecture transformation. You'll lead a team of engineers, make architectural decisions, and ensure best practices. This role combines technical leadership with hands-on development.
requirements: 7+ years of software engineering experience
3+ years in technical leadership roles
Expert knowledge of microservices architecture
Strong proficiency in Java and Spring Boot
Experience with container orchestration (Kubernetes)
Knowledge of event-driven architectures (Kafka, RabbitMQ)
Experience with API design and management
Strong understanding of distributed systems
Excellent communication and mentoring skills
Experience with Agile methodologies
